snippet: A pair floats over some high domestic hurdles to enjoy their laid-back summer house in the Hamptons.
abstract: David Duplantis and Christopher Nordquist renovate their laid-back summer house in the Southampton, reflecting their approach to decorating, entertaining and parenting; couple's collaborative style and efficiency are on display, as is their natural good humor and intelligence, evidenced by their furniture and design choices.
lead_paragraph: A pair floats over some high domestic hurdles to enjoy their laid-back summer house in the Hamptons.
